p_articles.title: Hot Love stars Jay C and Buoyancé are awkward on set
p_articles.body: Both Jay C and Buoyancé are having a hard time acting out their roles which affect their performance because their family might misunderstand what they are doing on set.

p_articles.title: Buoyancé’s spinach soup recipe reaches millions of views!
p_articles.body: Popular celebrity Buoyancé’s recipe of her healthy signature dish spinach soup gains over 5 million views on the internet! “It’s good for the skin”, the pop celebrity stated.

p_articles.title: Jay C found in denial on rumors after a recent interview
p_articles.body: Regarding the spreading rumors, rapper Jay C seemed to be in denial about it. The rapper never said anything in particular except the words “no” and “not true”.

p_articles.title: Jay C shatters rumors by proving he’s on good terms with Buoyancé's mother
p_articles.body: Rapper Jay C proved that he and Buoyancé's mother are on good terms ever since. His detailed explanation served as an evidence, clearing up the rumors.

p_articles.title: Rumors were true: Buoyancé's mother doesn’t want Jay C as her future son-in-law
p_articles.body: Mother of Buoyancé doesn’t want Jay C to marry her daughter because he's too much for her. Buoyancé’s mother wants to cancel their engagement as soon as possible.

p_articles.title: Jay C’s facial hair ruined his own relationship with Buoyancé!
p_articles.body: Buoyancé's mother said that Jay C is not good for her daughter. “It has a lot of impact for my daughter to marry a man who cannot shave his facial hair,” she says.
